title: Website Redesign
description: Revamp the landing page layout, improve navigation flow, and optimize visuals to increase conversion rates and visitor engagement.

title: Database Optimization
description: Enhance database performance by adding missing indexes, rewriting slow queries, and reducing response time for user requests.

title: Mobile App UI Update
description: Redesign profile and settings screens using a modern color palette, improved icons, and better user accessibility flow.

title: Security Audit
description: Perform full backend vulnerability testing, identify potential exploits, and provide actionable fixes to strengthen system defenses.

title: Email Automation Setup
description: Integrate onboarding and billing workflows, automate follow-up emails, and ensure proper SMTP configuration for reliable delivery.

title: Payment Gateway Integration
description: Add Stripe integration, test all payment endpoints, handle refunds securely, and implement error logging for failed transactions.

title: Content Migration
description: Transfer all blog articles from old CMS, maintain SEO structure, and verify media links work properly after migration.

title: Analytics Dashboard
description: Develop a real-time dashboard that visualizes sales metrics, user activity, and conversion data with filter and export options.

title: Cloud Deployment
description: Deploy microservices on AWS using ECS and Fargate, ensure autoscaling, and implement monitoring for uptime and resource usage.

title: UI Bug Fixes
description: Resolve component layout issues, correct inconsistent margins and colors, and verify responsive behavior across major devices.

title: API Documentation
description: Create structured API reference, include request examples, response codes, and detailed authentication workflow for developers.

title: Performance Testing
description: Run load and stress tests on backend endpoints, identify bottlenecks, and propose improvements for faster performance handling.

title: CRM Integration
description: Connect internal sales tools with Salesforce API, sync leads and activities, and automate customer updates between both systems.

title: User Feedback System
description: Develop a feedback modal for collecting user opinions, store data in analytics, and display insights in the dashboard.

title: SEO Optimization
description: Enhance site ranking by refining meta tags, improving load speed, optimizing content keywords, and fixing broken internal links.
